name: Sweet Tooth (itch)
description:
Sweet tooth
Grab your friends and play this magical sweet chase in a 3-player couch co-op game.

How to play?
The Children
   • pick up the key
   • walk through the sparkle effects to load it up
   • 3 load ups later it is big enough to open the door
   • both siblings need to escape
The Witch
   • pick up the children
   • throw them in the cage
   • wait till the oven is hot
   • throw a child in the oven to win

Pro Tips:
• Potions have four different effects (Frog,Konfusion,Speed and Fat Potions) and change colors each round
• Gingerbreadman jumps to random positions on the map, marked by crumps on the floor.
• The mug  can block the way trough spilling hot chocolate 

Controls:

• Hold down aiming button (LB) and the direction you want to throw while pressing (A) to confirm your throw or (B) to use on your selfe.

Teammembers:
Clara Müller, Daria Varfolomeeva, Linus Steffens, Markus Werner, Rachael Spencer
